author: Special Correspondent
text:
I have not given any statement to anyone, tweeted Vijay Mallya.

A representative of Vijay Mallya approached the cyber police on Tuesday in connection with an interview by the former liquor baron published in a newspaper on Sunday.

Mr. Mallya had on Monday denied giving any media interviews claiming that he wanted to return to India, but the “time was not right”.

“Shocked to see media statements that I gave an interview to Sunday Guardian without verification. I have not given any statement to anyone,” he tweeted. The newspaper had responded by saying that the interview was conducted by email and published the email trail. Mr. Mallya denied that he ever used the email and claimed it was perhaps a fake email account.
title: Email was fake: Mallya
